alert.note: Alert for Caledonia (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Essex, Lamoille, western Caledonia, central Chittenden and northwestern Washington Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burlington International Airport, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, South Burlington, Burlington International Airport, Burlington, Morrisville, Johnson Village, Eden, Cambridge, Winooski, Stowe, Jeffersonville Village, Hyde Park, Essex Junction Village, Wolcott, Williston, Worcester, Bolton, Richmond, Underhill and Jericho. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 73 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern New York...and central, northeastern and northwestern Vermont.
